data.actual_result: The selection handles float beneath the text field
data.expected_result: The selection handles should be anchored to the text
data.short_description: Text selection handles aren't anchored to text
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server - Tap the server name and then Change Nickname - Type any text into the field - Tap and hold on the text and choose Select All - Tap Look Up or Share - Close the lookup/share popup
